thread.title: ‘We will not settle for a FAKE Brexit’ Michael Gove urges Government to deliver Article 50
thread.title_full: ‘We will not settle for a FAKE Brexit’ Michael Gove urges Government to deliver Article 50

title: ‘We will not settle for a FAKE Brexit’ Michael Gove urges Government to deliver Article 50
text: The Tory MP underlined Britain needs to leave the single market We need to deliver a full Brexit, not settle for fake Brexit Michael Gove “Once Article 50 is triggered, we should be very clear about our simple, straightforward, generous approach to leaving. “We don't want or need to be in the single market - outside we can control our own borders, laws and taxes. Inside we're trapped. GETTY Mr Gove said we cannot settle for a 'fake Brexit' Top 50 influencers on Brexit Fri, December 2, 2016 Play slideshow 1 of 51 “We don't want to be bound by being members of the customs union. Outside we can negotiate new trade deals with emerging economies. Inside we're trapped. “And we don't need to waste months talking about new tariffs. We don't have any at the moment with Europe, we don't want to impose any and attempts to over-complicate the issue are a trap.“ Related articles
